author: Reuters Editorial
title: CORRECTED-South Africa's Mediclinic full-year core earnings up 3 percent
text:
(Corrects margin of percentage increase to 3 percent not 4 percent)
JOHANNESBURG, May 24 (Reuters) - South African private hospital group Mediclinic reported a 3 percent rise in annual core profit on Thursday, boosted by a recovery in its Middle Eastern operations.
Mediclinic, which also owns Switzerlandâ€™s largest private hospital group Hirslanden, said core earnings - or adjusted earnings before tax, interest, depreciation and amortisation (EBITDA) - totalled 522 million pounds ($698 million) in the year ended March compared with 509 million pounds a year earlier.
$1 = 0.7483 pounds Reporting by Tiisetso Motsoeneng; Editing by MarkPotter
